description:
The Diverse and Utility Token with Co-Blockchain. Asian Fintech (Afin) provide online business platform for various business entrepreneurs and companies and bring them on Blockchain platform to applications for business platforms in those fields.

Afin is incorporating Blockchain technology to expand and diversify the business of Afin and its partners. It is cost effective and convenient for both the sellers and the buyers
Afin has developed Co-BlockChain as well. The ERC-20 was used for the major currency, Afin Coin. And chose the SCP standard for the AfinS coin blockchain, which is a secondary currency for the efficiency of payment and transfer.
name: Asian Fintech
